name: Cat Swap Tiles (itch)
description:
Join the kitten on this amazing journey. Solve well-balanced puzzles. Get through beautiful and challenging places and help the little cat to find his friend. No score, no timer and no pressure. Just relax and enjoy the game!

Demo Available!

Features

  1. 44 well-balanced swap tile puzzles;
  2. Handcrafted beautiful art;
  3. Peaceful and relaxing gameplay atmosphere;
  4. Many Achievements;
  5. Easy to play.

OTHER GAMES FROM OVERACTION
